tags.name: activity
tags.description: Activity endpointsAn activity is a parent classification that contains Observations, Treatments, and Monitoring 'activities'

externalDocs.description: Visit GitHub to find out more about this API

Bearer.description: To access the authenticated api routes, a valid JWT token must be present in the 'Authorization' header.The 'Authorization' header value must be of the form: `Bearer xxxxxx.yyyyyyy.zzzzzz`

additional_auth_information.title: Authorization information
additional_auth_information.x-tooltip-text: Description of authorization permit for in-stream work (e.g. In-stream Notification, private landowner authorization in private pond, etc).

water_level_management.title: Water Level Management
water_level_management.x-tooltip-text: Select existing infrastructure, if any, that could allow water level management. If other, specify in comment field

substrate_type.title: Substrate Type
substrate_type.x-tooltip-text: Select the most prevalent substrate composition

tidal_influence.title: Tidal Influence
tidal_influence.x-tooltip-text: Indicate if the water level at the observation point is influenced by tides

inflow_permanent.title: Inflow (Permanent)
inflow_permanent.x-tooltip-text: Permanent, year round water inflow(s) adjacent to observation (e.g. river)

inflow_other.title: Inflow (Temp. or seasonal)
inflow_other.x-tooltip-text: Temporary or seasonal water inflow(s) adjacent to observation (e.g. overland flow)

outflow.title: Outflow
outflow.x-tooltip-text: Permanent, year-round water outflow(s) adjacent to observation (e.g. river, downstream culvert, etc)

shoreline_types.title: Shoreline Types
shoreline_types.x-tooltip-text: Specify shoreline types with their respective percentages

water_flow_rate.title: Water flow rate (m/sec)
water_flow_rate.x-tooltip-text: Indicates average rate of water flow across treatment area, this affects herbicide dispersion and efficacy.

activity_date_time.title: Date and Time
activity_date_time.x-tooltip-text: Date and time of the activity

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.x-tooltip-text: Latitude of the anchor point for the specified geometry

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.x-tooltip-text: Longitude of the anchor point for the specified geometry

utm_zone.title: UTM Zone
utm_zone.x-tooltip-text: UTM Zone of the anchor point for the specified geometry

utm_easting.title: UTM Easting
utm_easting.x-tooltip-text: UTM Easting of the anchor point for the specified geometry

utm_northing.title: UTM Northing
utm_northing.x-tooltip-text: UTM Northing of the anchor point for the specified geometry

reported_area.title: Area (m²)
reported_area.x-tooltip-text: Area of the activity automatically created from the geometry in square metres

employer_code.title: Employer
employer_code.x-tooltip-text: The company or agency that the person(s) completing the activity is directly employed by

invasive_species_agency_code.title: Funding Agency
invasive_species_agency_code.x-tooltip-text: Choose the organization that is paying for the work to be done. If multiple funders exist or in cases when an agency has been hired to manage the work on behalf of the primary funding agency, multiple Funding Agencies may be chosen.

location_description.title: Location Description
location_description.x-tooltip-text: Text entry to provide location directions. Locations should start general and get more specific

access_description.title: Access Description
access_description.x-tooltip-text: Text entry to provide access directions.

jurisdictions.title: Jurisdictions
jurisdictions.x-tooltip-text: Specify one or more jurisdictions for this activity

project_code.title: Project Code
project_code.x-tooltip-text: User defined identifier that can be used to filter or sort records

general_comment.title: Comment
general_comment.x-tooltip-text: Plain text description of any supporting information about the observation that is not captured elsewhere (up to 2000 characters)

invasive_species_agency_code.title: Agency
invasive_species_agency_code.x-tooltip-text: Organization that is paying to have this work done

jurisdictions.title: Jurisdictions
jurisdictions.x-tooltip-text: Specify one or more jurisdictions for this activity

observation_type_code.title: Type
observation_type_code.x-tooltip-text: Choose type of observation from dropdown

observation_persons.title: Observation Person(s)
observation_persons.x-tooltip-text: Name of person(s) doing the observation

survey_type.title: Survey Type
survey_type.x-tooltip-text: Presence survey used to determine general presence of invasive species in waterbody. Extent survey used to delineate each point and polygon of a target species prior to treatment

observation_plant_terrestrial_data.title: Observation Data
observation_plant_terrestrial_data.x-tooltip-text: Please specify your observation specific data

invasive_plants.title: Terrestrial Invasive Plants
invasive_plants.x-tooltip-text: Specify one or more terrestrial invasive plants for this observation

water_level_management.title: Water Level Management
water_level_management.x-tooltip-text: Select existing infrastructure, if any, that could allow water level management. If other, specify in comment field

substrate_type.title: Substrate Type
substrate_type.x-tooltip-text: Select the most prevalent substrate composition

tidal_influence.title: Tidal Influence
tidal_influence.x-tooltip-text: Indicate if the water level at the observation point is influenced by tides

adjacent_land_use.title: Adjacent Land Use
adjacent_land_use.x-tooltip-text: Select all adjacent land uses that apply and add details in the comment box.

inflow_permanent.title: Inflow (Permanent)
inflow_permanent.x-tooltip-text: Permanent, year round water inflow(s) adjacent to observation (e.g. river)

inflow_other.title: Inflow (Temp. or seasonal)
inflow_other.x-tooltip-text: Temporary or seasonal water inflow(s) adjacent to observation (e.g. overland flow)

outflow.title: Outflow
outflow.x-tooltip-text: Permanent, year-round water outflow(s) adjacent to observation (e.g. river, downstream culvert, etc)

shoreline_types.title: Shoreline Types
shoreline_types.x-tooltip-text: Specify shoreline types with their respective percentages

reach_number.title: Reach Number
reach_number.x-tooltip-text: A homogenous channel segment in sequence starting at 1 at the downstream end

adjacent_land_use.title: Adjacent Land Use
adjacent_land_use.x-tooltip-text: Select all adjacent land uses that apply and add details in the comment box.

watershed_code.title: Watershed Code
watershed_code.x-tooltip-text: 45 digit number, reference the BC Watershed Atlas

additional_site_features.title: Additional Site Features
additional_site_features.x-tooltip-text: Add in details regarding additional site features

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Target invasive plant species at this location

monitoring_organization.title: Monitoring Organization
monitoring_organization.x-tooltip-text: The organization or company doing the monitoring

biological_agent_presence_code.title: Biological Agent Presence
biological_agent_presence_code.x-tooltip-text: Visible state of the agent present

count_duration.title: Duration of Count (min)
count_duration.x-tooltip-text: Time spent on counting the agents (minutes)

biological_agent_code.title: Biological Agent
biological_agent_code.x-tooltip-text: Genus species code of the agent (ie ALTICAR [Altica carduorum])

collection_history.title: Collection History
collection_history.x-tooltip-text: Enter the IAPP or InvasivesBC record number to indicate the location where the biocontrol agents were collected from

collection_history_comments.title: Collection History Comments
collection_history_comments.x-tooltip-text: Enter relevant information about where the biocontrol agents being released came from, how they were shipped, and any related information

suitable_collection_site.title: Suitable Collection Site
suitable_collection_site.x-tooltip-text: Do the current biocontrol agent populations and location indicate that this may be a suitable collection site in the future? Add details in the comment field.

water_level_management.title: Water Level Management
water_level_management.x-tooltip-text: Select existing infrastructure, if any, that could allow water level management. If other, specify in comment field

substrate_type.title: Substrate Type
substrate_type.x-tooltip-text: Select the most prevalent substrate composition

tidal_influence.x-tooltip-text: Indicate if the water level at the observation point is influenced by tides

inflow_permanent.x-tooltip-text: Permanent, year round water inflow(s) adjacent to observation (e.g. river)

inflow_other.title: Inflow (Temp. or seasonal)
inflow_other.x-tooltip-text: Temporary or seasonal water inflow(s) adjacent to observation (e.g. overland flow)

shoreline_types.x-tooltip-text: Specify shoreline types with their respective percentages

water_flow_rate.title: Water flow rate (m/sec)
water_flow_rate.x-tooltip-text: Indicates average rate of water flow across treatment area, this affects herbicide dispersion and efficacy.

applicator2_license.title: Secondary Pesticide Applicator Certificate Number
applicator2_license.x-tooltip-text: Valid secondary pesticide applicator certificate number

pesticide_employer_code.title: Service License Number and Company Name

pesticide_use_permit_PUP.title: Pesticide Use Permit
pesticide_use_permit_PUP.x-tooltip-text: Enter applicable number if treatment is being completed under pesticide use permit

pest_management_plan.title: Pest Management Plan
pest_management_plan.x-tooltip-text: Enter applicable number if treatment is being completed under a pest management plan

additional_auth_information.title: Additional authorization information
additional_auth_information.x-tooltip-text: Description of authorization permit for in-stream work (e.g. In-stream Notification, private landowner authorization in private pond, etc).

water_temperature.title: Water Temperature (C)
water_temperature.x-tooltip-text: Measured in degrees celsius at time of treatment

air_temperature.title: Air Temperature (C)
air_temperature.x-tooltip-text: Measured in degrees celsius at time of treatment

wind_speed.title: Wind Speed (km/h)
wind_speed.x-tooltip-text: Wind speed in km/hr at time of treatment

wind_direction_code.title: Wind Direction
wind_direction_code.x-tooltip-text: Cardinal wind direction at time of treatment

signage_on_site.title: Treatment Notice Signs
signage_on_site.x-tooltip-text: Indicate if treatment sign(s) were installed at entrance point to the treatment area. If no, indicate in the comments why not

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Target invasive plant species being treated at this location

tank_mix.title: Tank Mix
tank_mix.x-tooltip-text: Check if there is a mix of herbicides in the tank

applicator2_license.x-tooltip-text: Valid secondary pesticide applicator certificate number

temperature.x-tooltip-text: Measured in degrees celcius at time of treatment (ideally between 15 and 22 degrees)

wind_speed.x-tooltip-text: Wind speed in km/hr at time of treatment

invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Target invasive plant species treated at this location

treatment_issues_code.title: Treatment Issue
treatment_issues_code.x-tooltip-text: Environmental condition that may effect survival of biocontrol

classified_area_code.title: Classified Area
classified_area_code.x-tooltip-text: Classification of type of biological treatment - ie research, primary

release_quantity.title: Release Quantity
release_quantity.x-tooltip-text: Number of agents released (exact or approximate)

mortality.x-tooltip-text: Number of agents dead at time of release

agent_source.x-tooltip-text: Agent source location and organization (50 characters)

suitable_collection_site.title: Suitable Collection Site
suitable_collection_site.x-tooltip-text: Do the current biocontrol agent populations and location indicate that this may be a suitable collection site in the future? Add details in the comment field.

agent_destroyed_ind.title: Agent Destroyed
agent_destroyed_ind.x-tooltip-text: Please indicate whether the agent was destroyed

legacy_presence_ind.title: Legacy Presence
legacy_presence_ind.x-tooltip-text: Please indicate the presence of legacy IAPP records

foliar_feeding_damage_ind.title: Foliar Feeding Damage
foliar_feeding_damage_ind.x-tooltip-text: Please indicate the presence of foliar feeding damage

root_feeding_damage_ind.title: Root Feeding Damage
root_feeding_damage_ind.x-tooltip-text: Please indicate the presence of root feeding damage

oviposition_marks_ind.title: Oviposition Marks
oviposition_marks_ind.x-tooltip-text: Please indicate the presence of oviposition marks

eggs_present_ind.title: Eggs Present
eggs_present_ind.x-tooltip-text: Please indicate the presence of eggs

larvae_present_ind.title: Larvae Present
larvae_present_ind.x-tooltip-text: Please indicate the presence of larvae

pupae_present_ind.title: Pupae Present
pupae_present_ind.x-tooltip-text: Please indicate the presence of pupae

adults_present_ind.title: Adults Present
adults_present_ind.x-tooltip-text: Please indicate the presence of adults

tunnels_present_ind.title: Tunnels Present
tunnels_present_ind.x-tooltip-text: Please indicate the presence of tunnels

collection_persons.title: Name(s) of Person(s) doing the collection
collection_persons.x-tooltip-text: Name of person(s) doing the observation

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Target invasive plant species at this location

biological_agent_code.title: Biological Control Agent
biological_agent_code.x-tooltip-text: The biological control agent that was collected.

historical_iapp_site_id.title: Historical IAPP site ID
historical_iapp_site_id.x-tooltip-text: Record number from historical Invasive  Alien Plant Program (IAPP) data, if known, to enable tracing to historical biocontrol records.

actual_quantity_and_life_stage_of_agent_.title: Actual Quantity and Life Stage of Agent Collected
actual_quantity_and_life_stage_of_agent_.x-tooltip-text: The quantity of the biocontrol agent collected in the life stage it was collected. If it was a life stage within a gall the number of galls would the quantity collected. This may not be the ACTUAL (TRUE) quantities of the collection noting that some agents collected in seedheads or galls may have more than one agent or no agents / part collected.

estimated_quantity_and_life_stage_of_age.title: Estimated Quantity and Life Stage of Agent Collected
estimated_quantity_and_life_stage_of_age.x-tooltip-text: When plant parts are collected with agents within those plant parts, an estimate of the quantity of the biocontrol agent collected in the life stage it was collected if required.

comment.title: Comment
comment.x-tooltip-text: Any comments of particular interest regarding this collection that does not fit elsewhere.

encoded_file.description: A Data URL base64 encoded image

temperature.title: Temperature (C)
temperature.x-tooltip-text: Enter the highest temperature (in Celcius) that occurred during the collection period.

cloud_cover_code.title: Cloud Cover
cloud_cover_code.x-tooltip-text: Enter the average cloud cover over the duration of the collection

precipitation_code.title: Precipitation
precipitation_code.x-tooltip-text: Enter the average preciptation over the duration of the collection

wind_speed.title: Wind Speed (km/h)
wind_speed.x-tooltip-text: Enter the average wind over the duration of the collection

jurisdiction_code.title: Jurisdiction
jurisdiction_code.x-tooltip-text: Entity that owns or is responsible for the land base or water body

shoreline_type.title: Shoreline Type
shoreline_type.x-tooltip-text: Describe shoreline composition adjacent to observation (e.g. rip rap, road/parking lot, overhanging natural riparian veg, turf, fence, etc)

percent_covered.title: Percent Covered
percent_covered.x-tooltip-text: Percent covered by this shoreline type

soil_texture_code.title: Soil Texture
soil_texture_code.x-tooltip-text: Relative amount of sand, silt, clay, organic matter, and bedrock throughout the observation area

specific_use_code.title: Specific Use
specific_use_code.x-tooltip-text: Notable land uses or attributes within the observation area

slope_code.title: Slope
slope_code.x-tooltip-text: Exact or general slope of the land expressed as a percentage

aspect_code.title: Aspect
aspect_code.x-tooltip-text: Average orientation that slope is facing within the observation area (ie; SE = southeast)

research_detection_ind.title: Research Observation
research_detection_ind.x-tooltip-text: Is this observation part of a research project? Add details in project code or comments fields

well_ind.title: Visible Well Nearby
well_ind.x-tooltip-text: Is there a visible well nearby? Indicate the distance from the observation in the comments

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Target invasive plant species for this observation at this location. Create a separate observation for any other species at this location

occurrence.title: Occurrence
occurrence.x-tooltip-text: The observation describes the presence or absence of target invasive plants within a defined area

edna_sample.title: eDNA sample
edna_sample.x-tooltip-text: Genetic material that can be extracted from bulk environmental samples such as water and soil.

invasive_plant_density_code.title: Density
invasive_plant_density_code.x-tooltip-text: Average number of individual plants per square meter expressed as a density class code

invasive_plant_distribution_code.title: Distribution
invasive_plant_distribution_code.x-tooltip-text: Description of the average arrangement of invasive plant clusters within the observation area expressed as a distribution code

plant_life_stage_code.title: Life Stage
plant_life_stage_code.x-tooltip-text: Average phenological stage of plant; rosette, flowering, etc

voucher_specimen_collected.title: Voucher Specimen Collected
voucher_specimen_collected.x-tooltip-text: Ideal to collect entire plant structure for verification purposes.

voucher_sample_id.title: Voucher Sample ID
voucher_sample_id.x-tooltip-text: Unique identifier for each voucher collected.

exact_utm_coords.title: Exact UTM coordinates of voucher collection site

sample_point_id.title: Sample Point ID
sample_point_id.x-tooltip-text: For Presence Surveys. Number each sample point in the same waterbody (e.g. 001, 002, 003, etc). Do not use for Extent Surveys

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: For Presence survey: select species observed at coordinates. For Extent Survey: select target species for survey

observation_type.title: Observation Type
observation_type.x-tooltip-text: The observation describes the absence of target invasive plants within a defined area

invasive_plant_density_code.title: Density
invasive_plant_density_code.x-tooltip-text: Average number of individual plants per square meter expressed as a density class code

invasive_plant_distribution_code.title: Distribution
invasive_plant_distribution_code.x-tooltip-text: Description of the average arrangement of invasive plant clusters within the observation area expressed as a distribution code

plant_life_stage_code.title: Life Stage
plant_life_stage_code.x-tooltip-text: Average phenological stage of plant; rosette, flowering, etc

voucher_specimen_collected.title: Voucher Specimen Collected
voucher_specimen_collected.x-tooltip-text: If specimen collected, provide details in observation comments

genetic_sample_id.title: Genetic Sample ID
genetic_sample_id.x-tooltip-text: Unique identifier for each voucher collected. Helpful to include abbreviation of waterbody name

genetic_structure_collected.title: Genetic Structure Collected
genetic_structure_collected.x-tooltip-text: Describe plant parts collected. Ideal to collect entire plant structure for verification purposes

edna_sample.title: eDNA Sample
edna_sample.x-tooltip-text: Genetic material that can be extracted from bulk environmental samples such as water and soil

application_rate.title: Application Rate (L/ha)
application_rate.x-tooltip-text: Recommended label rate for herbicide (L/ha) used for this treatment

herbicide_amount.title: Amount of Mix Used (L)
herbicide_amount.x-tooltip-text: Volume in litres (ie 5.1 L) of herbicide and water mix

mix_delivery_rate.title: Delivery Rate of Mix (L/ha)
mix_delivery_rate.x-tooltip-text: Calibrated delivery rate of the device used to apply herbicide in L/ha

dilution.title: Dilution %
dilution.x-tooltip-text: Percent (%) of product in the mix

specific_treatment_area.title: Specific Treatment Area (ha)
specific_treatment_area.x-tooltip-text: Area of the chemical treatment (ha) automatically calculated from the application and delivery rates used during chemical treatment

application_rate.title: Application Rate (g/ha)
application_rate.x-tooltip-text: Recommended label rate for herbicide (G/ha) used for this treatment

herbicide_amount.title: Amount of Mix Used (g)
herbicide_amount.x-tooltip-text: Volume in granules (ie 5.1 g) of herbicide and water mix

mix_delivery_rate.title: Delivery Rate of Mix (g/ha)
mix_delivery_rate.x-tooltip-text: Calibrated delivery rate of the device used to apply herbicide in g/ha

dilution.title: Dilution %
dilution.x-tooltip-text: Percent (%) of product in the mix

specific_treatment_area.title: Specific Treatment Area (ha)
specific_treatment_area.x-tooltip-text: Area of the chemical treatment (ha) automatically calculated from the application and delivery rates used during chemical treatment

herbicide_type.title: Herbicide Type
herbicide_type.x-tooltip-text: Choose whether the herbicide being used is liquid or granular

tank_volume.title: Tank Volume (L)
tank_volume.x-tooltip-text: Capacity of tank measured in litres

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Target invasive plant species at this location

invasive_plant_density_code.title: Density
invasive_plant_density_code.x-tooltip-text: Average number of individual plants per square meter expressed as a density class code

invasive_plant_distribution_code.title: Distribution
invasive_plant_distribution_code.x-tooltip-text: Description of the average arrangement of invasive plant clusters within the observation area expressed as a distribution code

soil_texture_code.title: Soil Texture
soil_texture_code.x-tooltip-text: Relative amount of sand, silt, clay, organic matter, and bedrock throughout the observation area

linear_infestation.title: Linear
linear_infestation.x-tooltip-text: If the infestation distribution is linear, select Yes

biological_agent_code.title: Proposed Biological Agent
biological_agent_code.x-tooltip-text: Genus species code of the agent (ie ALTICAR [Altica carduorum])

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Invasive plant species observed at this location

transect_start_date_time.title: Start Date and Time
transect_start_date_time.x-tooltip-text: Start time and date of the collection

transect_end_date_time.title: End Date and Time
transect_end_date_time.x-tooltip-text: End time and date of the collection

project_number.title: Project Number
project_number.x-tooltip-text: The unique project or reference number (ie ABC123)

research_trial_code.title: Research Trial
research_trial_code.x-tooltip-text: Is this observation part of a research project or trial. If yes, add details in Project Code or Comments fields

site_aspect.title: Site Aspect
site_aspect.x-tooltip-text: Specify (in degrees) the direction that the slope is facing

site_aspect_variability.title: Site Aspect Variability
site_aspect_variability.x-tooltip-text: If the plant infestation extends into multiple aspects, select Yes

site_slope.title: Site Slope
site_slope.x-tooltip-text: Use a clinometer to obtain the percent of the slope for the site

site_slope_variability.title: Site Slope Variability
site_slope_variability.x-tooltip-text: If a plant infestation extends over more than one significant slope, select Yes

site_elevation.title: Site Elevation
site_elevation.x-tooltip-text: Use a GPS to obtain and record the average elevation

precipitation_code.title: Precipitation
precipitation_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative precipitation state

burn_severity_code.title: Burn Severity
burn_severity_code.x-tooltip-text: Has the observation area been burnt?

mesoslope_position_code.title: Mesoslope Position
mesoslope_position_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative mesoslope condition

site_surface_shape_code.title: Site Surface Shape
site_surface_shape_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative slope shape

soil_properties_code.title: Soil Properties
soil_properties_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative soil property

surface_substrate_code.title: Surface Substrate
surface_substrate_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative subsurface condition

site_activity_disturbance.title: Site Activity/Disturbance
site_activity_disturbance.x-tooltip-text: If the site is disturbed, select Yes

disturbance_site_defunct.title: Disturbance Site Defunct
disturbance_site_defunct.x-tooltip-text: If the site is defunct, select Yes

disturbance_condition_code.title: Disturbance Condition
disturbance_condition_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative disturbance condition

disturbance_type_code.title: Disturbance Type
disturbance_type_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the most representative disturbance type

invasive_plant_change_code.title: Invasive Plant Change
invasive_plant_change_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the observed change on all species

target_plant_change_code.title: Target Plant Change
target_plant_change_code.x-tooltip-text: Select the observed change on the target species

treatment_seeded.title: Treatment Seeded
treatment_seeded.x-tooltip-text: If the observation area has been seeded, select Yes

trace_plants.title: Trace Plants

sample_point_id.title: Sample Point ID
sample_point_id.x-tooltip-text: Provide a unique transect point identifier (ie ABC123)

offset_distance.title: Plot Distance
offset_distance.x-tooltip-text: Provide the offset distance from the start point

utm_x.title: Offset Point UTM Easting
utm_x.x-tooltip-text: UTM Easting point at the offset distance

veg_transect_bare_ground.title: Vegetation Bare Ground Patches
veg_transect_bare_ground.x-tooltip-text: Percentage of bare ground patches observed

date_time_in.title: Date and Time In
date_time_in.x-tooltip-text: Start date and time of the survey

date_time_out.title: Date and Time Out
date_time_out.x-tooltip-text: End date and time of the survey

one_pass_time.title: Time of One Pass (seconds)
one_pass_time.x-tooltip-text: Total time for one pass in seconds

length.title: Length (m)
length.x-tooltip-text: The linear length of the electrofishing pass

width.title: Width (m)
width.x-tooltip-text: The linear length of the zone of stream in which the electrofishing was conducted

enclosure.title: Enclosure
enclosure.x-tooltip-text: An area enclosed with stop nets or natural barriers to prevent fish from escaping capture during electrofishing: Open/Closed/Partially enclosed

voltage.title: Voltage
voltage.x-tooltip-text: The electric potential used during the pass

frequency.title: Frequency (Hz)
frequency.x-tooltip-text: The number of pulses per second

pulse.title: Pulse (ms)
pulse.x-tooltip-text: Pulse width is the amount of time the current is truned on during one pulse

make.title: Make
make.x-tooltip-text: Name of the company that manufactured the electrofisher

water_sample_depth.title: Average depth of waterbody (m)
water_sample_depth.x-tooltip-text: Enter the water depth in metres

secchi_depth.title: Secchi Depth (m)
secchi_depth.x-tooltip-text: Enter the secchi depth in metres. The secchi depth is the depth of water beyond which a high-contrast pattern on a submerged disk is no longer visible.

waterbody_type.title: Waterbody Type
waterbody_type.x-tooltip-text: Select best description of waterbody type

waterbody_name_local.title: Waterbody Name (Local)
waterbody_name_local.x-tooltip-text: Locally referred to name of waterbody

waterbody_access.title: Waterbody Access
waterbody_access.x-tooltip-text: Waterbody access options, public access options preferred.

waterbody_use.title: Waterbody Use
waterbody_use.x-tooltip-text: Choose all observed uses of waterbody that apply. If other is chosen, add details in the comments.

surveys.title: Surveys
surveys.description: Legacy IAPP Surveys from this point of interest

Point_Of_Interest.title: Basic Information
Point_Of_Interest.description: Basic information captured for all points of interest

specific_use_code.title: Specific Use
specific_use_code.x-tooltip-text: Notable land uses or attributes within the observation area

application_rate.title: Application Rate (L/ha)
application_rate.x-tooltip-text: Recommended label rate for herbicide (L/ha) used for this treatment

herbicide_amount.title: Amount of Mix Used (L)
herbicide_amount.x-tooltip-text: Volume in litres (ie 5.1 L) of herbicide and water mix

mix_delivery_rate.title: Delivery Rate of Mix (L/ha)
mix_delivery_rate.x-tooltip-text: Calibrated delivery rate of the device used to apply herbicide in L/ha

dilution.title: Dilution %
dilution.x-tooltip-text: Percent (%) of product in the mix

temperature.title: Temperature (C)
temperature.x-tooltip-text: Measured in degrees celcius at time of treatment (ideally between 15 and 22 degrees)

wind_speed.title: Wind Speed (km/h)
wind_speed.x-tooltip-text: Wind speed in km/hr at time of treatment

wind_direction_code.title: Wind Direction
wind_direction_code.x-tooltip-text: Cardinal wind direction at time of treatment

humidity.title: Humidity
humidity.x-tooltip-text: Relative humidity expressed as a percentage

treatment_issues_code.title: Treatment Issue
treatment_issues_code.x-tooltip-text: Environmental condition that may effect survival of biocontrol

classified_area_code.title: Classified Area
classified_area_code.x-tooltip-text: Classification of type of biological treatment - ie research, primary

release_quantity.title: Release Quantity
release_quantity.x-tooltip-text: Number of agents released (exact or approximate)

mortality.title: Mortality
mortality.x-tooltip-text: Number of agents dead at time of release

agent_source.title: Agent Source
agent_source.x-tooltip-text: Agent source location and organization (50 characters)

biological_agent_code.title: Biological Agent
biological_agent_code.x-tooltip-text: Genus species code of the agent (ie ALTICAR [Altica carduorum])

biological_agent_code.title: Biological Agent
biological_agent_code.x-tooltip-text: Genus species code of the agent (ie ALTICAR [Altica carduorum])

invasive_plant_code.title: Invasive Plant
invasive_plant_code.x-tooltip-text: Target invasive plant species being treated at this location
